H3.text: what school did ben roethlisberger go to. Miami University

A4.text: Roethlisberger played college football at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio.

A5.text: Roethlisberger returned to Miami University to complete his college degree, graduating with a Bachelor of Science in Education on May 6, 2012.
